issue.title: www.wort-suchen.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: m.naver.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://m.naver.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fm.naver.com)
### Comment
> Hello, this is the Naver Development Team.
> 
> One of our team members previously contacted AdGuard support regarding an issue with Naver services when using AdGuard DNS, reporting that Android users with AdGuard DNS (dns.adguard.com) cannot access naver.com domains. We received confirmation from AdGuard support that naver.com domains are not blocked.
> 
> As a follow-up, we would like to provide additional details about the ongoing issue.
> 
> **Issue Overview:**
> We have recently received numerous reports from customers experiencing difficulties accessing Naver-related services through Android apps (Chrome, Google app, Naver app, etc.) when using AdGuard DNS. Based on customer inquiries and internal reproduction tests, we have confirmed that this issue occurs specifically when using AdGuard DNS in conjunction with LG U+, a major network provider in South Korea.
> 
> **Symptoms:**
> * Various Naver services (Naver Search, Naver Shopping, Naver News, etc.) are inaccessible or fail to load properly
>   > For example, when accessing "m.naver.com" through mobile Chrome or Google app, users encounter errors such as "Unable to connect to the Internet" or "This site can't be reached"
>   > Web pages fail to load in browser apps, displaying ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED errors
> * The issue is primarily reported by Android users
> * The problem occurs intermittently (not continuously), sometimes lasting several minutes
> * Our internal testing confirms the issue occurs specifically when using AdGuard DNS with the LG U+ network
>   > Configuration: Phone Settings > Connections > More connection settings > Private DNS > dns.adguard-dns.com (or dns.adguard.com)
> 
> **Actions Taken:**
> The Naver development team has contacted the LG U+ network team to investigate this issue further. We are reaching out to request AdGuard's cooperation as well, as this appears to be an interaction between AdGuard DNS and the LG U+ network that is affecting our users' ability to access Naver services.
> 
> We appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter.

### Screenshots
<details>

Just to clarify - do you want users to check `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/info.txt`:

1. **With AdGuard DNS enabled** (DNS over TLS active in Android settings)
2. **With AdGuard DNS disabled** (DNS over TLS turned off in Android settings)

And compare both results?

issue.title: www.hood.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hood.de/mein-hood.htm](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hood.de%2Fmein-hood.htm) ### Comment > Mit AdGuard ist kein Login auf hood.de mglich, die Seite beschwert sich ber angeblich blockierte Cookies. Mit deaktiviertem AdGuard funktioniert der Login. > Abschalten einzelner AdGuard-Funktionen wie "Trackng protection" (insbesondere Deaktivieren von "Tracking methods" wie "Delete third-party cookies") oder "Browsing Security" hilft nicht, es kommt dieselbe Fehlermeldung zu den Cookies. Nur komplettes Deaktivieren von AdGuard auf hood.de fhrt zu einem erfolgreichen Login. ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tuoitre.vn](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftuoitre.vn) ### Comment > Hello AdGuard Team, > > Our domain https://js.aiservice.vn/rec is part of a recommendation service that provides contextual content recommendations for publishers. > > Currently, this service is being used on the following website: > > https://tuoitre.vn/ > > The service does not: > > serve intrusive or disruptive advertisements > > perform cross-site tracking > > use fingerprinting or similar tracking techniques > > All recommended or sponsored content is clearly labeled, and the system operates in a privacy-friendly manner. > > We believe that the following blocking rule is a false positive, especially when applied to tuoitre.vn: > > Blocked rule: > ||js.aiservice.vn^ > > Filter list: > AdGuard Mobile Ads > > We kindly request that you review this rule and consider removing or exempting it for https://tuoitre.vn/. > > Thank you very much for your time and consideration. > > Best regards, > Thanh Phan ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tuoitre.vn](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftuoitre.vn) ### Comment > Hello AdGuard Team, > > Our domain https://js.aiservice.vn/rec is part of a recommendation service that provides contextual content recommendations for publishers. > > Currently, this service is being used on the following website: > > https://tuoitre.vn/ > > The service does not: > > serve intrusive or disruptive advertisements > > perform cross-site tracking > > use fingerprinting or similar tracking techniques > > All recommended or sponsored content is clearly labeled, and the system operates in a privacy-friendly manner. > > We believe that the following blocking rule is a false positive, especially when applied to tuoitre.vn: > > Blocked rule: > ||js.aiservice.vn^ > > Filter list: > AdGuard Mobile Ads > > We kindly request that you review this rule and consider removing or exempting it for https://tuoitre.vn/. > > Thank you very much for your time and consideration. > > Best regards, > Thanh Phan ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/bqinqev3p48oksc8gswk4ww88oskgckrdfol1flpcg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/laim30jjwlwo0k4cwwgwwc004o084gkq9hqjegsvr4.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://tuoitre.vn/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftuoitre.vn%2F) ### Comment > On the stream of news, i have 7 AI recommended news on top, then the news we set. > - When enable Adguard the 7 AI news disappear, and the top news is what we set. > - We would like to keep those 7 AI news on top although Adguard is enable. ### Screenshots

issue.title: boredpanda.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://boredpanda.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fboredpanda.com) ### Comment > admiral blocks page ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/jij3swn6glws0c80c0k404gk08s48ogfdzvur0yijs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12.2 System version: | `Android 16` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Peter Lowe's Blocklist

Annoyances:
